data.title: La Verite [The Truth] (Original photograph from the 1960 French film) by Henri-Georges Clouzot (director, screenwriter); Simone Drieu, Michele Perrein, Jerome Geornimi, Christiane Rochefort, Vera Clou
data.meta_description: N.p.: N.p., 1960. Vintage oversize borderless reference photograph from the 1960 French film, showing actors Charles Vanel and Brigitte Bardot. With...
data.text:
Â· N.p.

by Henri-Georges Clouzot (director, screenwriter); Simone Drieu, Michele Perrein, Jerome Geornimi, Christiane Rochefort, Vera Clouzot (screenwriter); Brigitte Bardot, Paul Meurisse, Charles Vanel, Marie-Jose Nat, Sami Frey (starring)

N.p.: N.p., 1960. Vintage oversize borderless reference photograph from the 1960 French film, showing actors Charles Vanel and Brigitte Bardot. With manuscript pencil and ink annotations on the verso regarding layout, along with the stamp of Parimage agency and ICI Paris.

A young woman finds herself standing trial for the murder of her lover, forcing her to reflect on her memories of their turbulent relationship.

Set in Paris.

11 x 7 inches. Very Good plus, with a few touch-ups on the recto for press use. (Inventory #: 149725)
